籤詩版本二:
Mudubi mai shekara dubu ya sake haduwa, mace ta nemi mijinta ya kara aure
Tun daga wannan lokacin, dangi ya canza, kuma an ƙara albarka ga 'ya'ya da jikoki.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram alama ce ta haɗuwa da madubai.
Komai yana aiki tuƙuru da tsada.
解曰: Tono yashi cikin zinari. Hawa dodanni da hawan damisa. Ko da yake yana da wahala. Akwai kari a ciki.
籤詩故事一:
◇Yulianhui abokai goma
A daular Song, Qian Yulian ya auri Wang Shipeng. Lokacin da Shi Peng ya je birnin Beijing don yin jarrabawar, hamshakin attajiri Sun Ruquan ya tilasta wa Yulian sake aure.
Qian Yulian ya ki amincewa da shawarar attajirin Sun Ruquan kuma ya gwammace ya auri Wang Shipeng, wani talakan malami daga Wenzhou wanda "Jing Chai" ya dauki hayarsa.
Daga baya Wang Shipeng ya lashe kyautar farko, saboda ya ki amincewa da tilasta masa yin aure da firaminista Wanqi ya yi, aka tura shi ya zama alkali a yankin Chaoyang mai nisa. Sun Ruquan ta canza wasikar dangin Wang Shipeng a asirce zuwa "wasikar saki" kuma ta yaudari Yulian don a yaudare ta, ita ma mahaifiyar Qian Yulian ta tilasta mata ta sake yin aure, amma Yulian ta ki yarda ta kashe kanta ta hanyar jefa kanta cikin kogi, Qian Zaihe ne ya ceto ta. daga Lardin Fujian kuma aka ɗauke shi a matsayin diyar riƙonsa.
Yulian ya yi tunanin Shipeng ya mutu, bayan shekaru biyar, Wang Shipeng shi ne gwamnan Ji'an, wata rana, ya gudanar da bikin tunawa a wani gidan ibada na Taoist don tunawa da marigayiyar matarsa. turare, kuma daga karshe Wang da Qian sun sake haduwa.
聖意: Gidan ba ya da kyau, kaka da damuna sun wadata, arziki ya wadata a kaka da damuna, kasuwanci ya ci nasara, a yi aure, a yi wa masu tafiya a kasa addu'a a tafi gona, za a iya kiwon siliki, a iya kiwon dabbobi shida. Tashe ana iya samun jama'a shari'ar jama'a ba ta da kyau, Hijira ra'ayin mazan jiya ne, hasarar dukiya.
